summary: TAKATA RECALL. IT HAS BEEN OVER A YEAR SINCE MY CAR WAS RECALLED. I HARDLY DRIVE IT SINCE I AM AFRAID OF HAVING AN ACCIDENT. I HEAR IT MAY NEVER BE FIXED AND I HAVE BEEN PAYING FOR THIS CAR SINCE OCT 2014. I HAVE LIKE 10,000 MILES ON MY CAR. JUST WANTED TO STATE HOW UPSET I AM TO NOT HAVE IT FIXED.
